name: Panzerotti
description: Sun-dried tomatoes atop sliced mozzarella. Choose fried or cold, and comes with a marinara dip.

name: Pizza Margherita
description: A beloved classic. Enjoy the traditional taste of the Motherland with locally-sourced herbs baked inside our wood-fire oven

name: Pinot Noir
description: A bold pairing for our pasta dishes. Explore the 'red' notes of the year 1815 (if you get this you took your history seriously).

name: Penne Arrabbiatta
description: Passion on a plate. Our homemade meat sauce will delight and agitate your palette thanks to pepperoncini's imported from Italy.

name: Cacio e Pepe
description: Oriechette pasta with our finest Pecorino Romano and toasted peppercorns. Can request for more or less spice.

name: Zeppole
description: Fried dough with powdered sugar. A nostalgic classic for any italian household.

name: Gelato
description: Homemade gelato done to bring the intense, savory flavors that you adore. Ask for chocolate, mint, or vanilla.
